remarks: Lattice translation of a meet.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrnm.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
ltrnm.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnm.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnm $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( F ` ( X ./\ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) ./\ ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
